citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 pm on
19-Nov-18.
This inspector attempted unsuccessfully to contact the licensee via telephone, text and electronic mail. Optimal
hours for future inspections are to be discussed and established.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45 pm on
19-Nov-18.
This inspector attempted unsuccessfully to contact the licensee via telephone, text and electronic mail.  Optimal
hours for future inspections are to be discussed and established.
